Nightlight::

Nightlight looked scared where the voice came, she felt better when 
she saw that it belonged to Aerotaur. 

"Aeortaur... Are you Ok?" she said "Nothing good it's happening... 
Gramps's strange, he said that someone will come to kill us all... he 
has in his hand a gun. I think that it's true, Perplex it's worry to, 
he said that... that guy is worse than someone named Clash and 
Serge... I think that they're the last who attack us... I was looking 
for a place to hide Trinity and go to fight... " she added while she 
looked Trinity " I don't like that no one hurts her... or hurt you"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He slowly came out of his daze and exited the CR chamber.  He 
felt better 
> now that his mech fluid had replenished itself.  He looked down at 
his chest 
> and saw that the cuts had healed.  He walks over to where 
Nightlight is 
> holding Trinity.  "What's going on?" he asks when he sees the 
concern on her 
> face.
